title: gpu memory cannot be used all
body_html:
hello,My hardware is ubuntu16.04LTS+gtx1080ti+cuda8.0+pytorch

when I run a pytorch program,which is a CNN.My gpu memorry has 11G,but I can not use all memorry.By using command line nvidia-smi,I see it is always used about 3.6G memorry.
what is the proble?how can I solve it?,thank you!
body_text:
hello,My hardware is ubuntu16.04LTS+gtx1080ti+cuda8.0+pytorch
when I run a pytorch program,which is a CNN.My gpu memorry has 11G,but I can not use all memorry.By using command line nvidia-smi,I see it is always used about 3.6G memorry.
what is the proble?how can I solve it?,thank you!
body:
hello,My hardware is ubuntu16.04LTS+gtx1080ti+cuda8.0+pytorch

when I run a pytorch program,which is a CNN.My gpu memorry has 11G,but I can not use all memorry.By using command line `nvidia-smi`,I see it is always used about 3.6G memorry.
what is the proble?how can I solve it?,thank you!
